text: قال لو ان لى بكم قوة او ءاوى الى ركن شديد

translations.translation: He said, 'If only I had the strength to combat you or could take refuge in some powerful support!'
I wish I had the power to resist you," said (Lot), "or powerful support."
He said: 'Would that I had the strength to set you straight, or could seek refuge in some powerful support.'
He said, "Would that I had the power (to overcome you) or could seek strong protection."
He said, “If only I had the strength against you or were able to get the refuge of some strong support!”
He said: "Would that I had strength to overpower you, or that I could betake myself to some powerful support."
He said: Ah! that I had power to suppress you, rather I shall have recourse to a strong support.
He said, 'O would that I had power against you, or might take refuge in a strong pillar!'
He said: Would that I had strength to resist you or had some strong support (among you)!
He said, "If only I had the strength to stop you or could take refuge in some powerful support!"
He said. Would that I had strength against you or could betake me to a powerful support!
He said, ‘If only I had the power to deter you, or could take refuge in a mighty support!’
He said: "Would that I had power to suppress you or that I could betake myself to some powerful support."
He said: "Would that I had strength (men) to overpower you, or that I could betake myself to some powerful support (to resist you)."
He said: 'Would that I were powerful over you, or might take refuge in a strong pillar'
He said, “If only I had the strength to stop you, or could rely on some strong support.”
He said, "If only I had against you some power or could take refuge in a strong support."

[11:80] He said, ‘Would that I had strength, power, to resist you or could resort to some strong support!’, [to] some clan that would help me, I would surely fall upon you. So, when the angels saw this,

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: وجوابه بِ { لَوْ أنّ لي بكم قوة } جواب يائس من ارعوائهم .و { لو } مستعملة في التمنّي ، وهذا أقصى ما أمكنه في تغيير هذا المنكر .والباء في { بكم } للاستعلاء ، أي عليكم . يقال : ما لي به قوة وما لي به طاقة . ومنه قوله تعالى : { قالوا لا طاقة لنا اليوم بجالوت } \[ البقرة : 249 \].ويقولون : مَا لي بهذا الأمر يَدان ، أي قدرة أو حيلة عليه .والمعنى : ليت لي قوة أدفعكم بها ، ويريد بذلك قوة أنصار لأنّه كان غريباً بينهم .ومعنى { أو آوى إلى ركن شديد } أو أعتصم بما فيه مَنعة ، أي بمكان أو ذي سلطان يمنعني منكم .والركن : الشق من الجبل المتّصل بالأرض .

translations.translation: (He said) Lot said within himself: (Would that I had strength) physical strength and sons to help me (to resist you or had some strong support (among you)!) or that I could rely on a strong clan such that I defend myself from you.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { أَوْ آوِيۤ إِلَىٰ رُكْنٍ شَدِيدٍ } معناهُ أصير فاُنصرْ
 والرُّكنُ الشَّدِيدُ: العَشِيرةُ
 والشَّديدُ: العَزيزُ المَنِيعُ

translations.translation:
And His saying, {or go to a strong fortification}, means to become victorious.


And the strong pillar: the tribe.


And the Strong One: the Mighty One who protects

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ولما اضطر لوط مسارعتهم ومماراتم { قَالَ } مشتكياً إلى الله: { لَوْ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمْ قُوَّةً } أدفع بها حزني وخزي أضيافي لأدفعكم بتوفيق الله { أَوْ آوِيۤ } وأرجع حين ظهور عدم مقاومتي ومدافعتي معكم { إِلَىٰ رُكْنٍ شَدِيدٍ } [هود: 80] هو حفظ الله وكنف جواره وحصن حضانته


ثم لما رأى الرسل اضطرار لوط واضطرابه
 إذ هو يغل على أضيافه باب بيته فيجاجل مع قومه
 يتكلم معهم
 وبعدما امتدت مجادلته معهم
